lyrics.text:
Koe ‘Eiki pē ‘a koe
Ko e Ko Au, Māfimafi,
Pea ‘oku ou ‘atu ni,
‘Eiki ki he ‘Afiona;
‘A ia ‘oku ou ma’u ni
‘Oku ‘a’au kotoa pē.

‘Oku ke, Ai Pē ‘akoe,
Pea mo e ‘ofa koe,
Pea mo e māfimafi,
Ke fai pē ho finangalo,
‘Eiki ‘ofa ke u fai ma’u pē,
Ki ho finangalo lelei.

Pea ke fai loto taha,
‘E Hēvani mo māmani,
Pea faka’apa’apa
Ki he ‘Eiki langilangi,
Pea tui kotoa pē,
‘Eiki ki he ‘Afiona.
